channel.title: World
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from World, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Top Democrat on House homeland security committee calls for Kristi Noem to resign as protestor interrupts meeting – US politics live
item.description: Heckler shouts ‘end the deportations’ as Mississippi congressman Bennie Thompson says, under Noem’s direction, DHS has ‘detained Americans’ Chris Van ...

item.title: Kilmar Ábrego García ordered released from ICE custody in fight over Trump immigration
item.description: Maryland judge freed Ábrego as his case becomes a partisan flashpoint in battle over Trump’s deportation agenda A federal court in Maryland has ordere...

item.title: Reaching net zero: what will it cost the UK and is it a price worth paying?
item.description: An official report says the bill for switching to clean energy will rise sharply – and puts forward a slower, ‘falling behind” alternative The cost of...

item.title: Austria votes to ban headscarves in schools for girls under 14
item.description: Law passes despite fears it will ‘normalise Islamophobia’ and fact it could be struck down by constitutional court Lawmakers in Austria have voted ove...

item.title: No 10 brushes off claims Streeting’s criticism of ‘technocratic approach’ refers to Starmer – UK politics live
item.description: Health secretary admitted to being ‘frustrated’ with approach to governing in interview Seema Malhotra , a Foreign Office minister, is responding to t...

item.title: Elite Coast Guard squad and 'dark fleet' ship - what we know about US seizure of oil tanker
item.description: The US seizure of a crude oil ship is the latest in a series of escalations in the Trump administration's pressure campaign on Venezuela.

item.title: Ukraine hands US revised peace plan proposal, Germany says
item.description: The latest draft includes proposals on territorial concessions, Germany's chancellor says.

item.title: 'Monumental betrayal' - cheapest World Cup final ticket to cost £3,119
item.description: Fans' group Football Supporters Europe says it is "astonished" by the "extortionate" pricing policy for World Cup tickets.

item.title: From Iran to China to Venezuela - how tanker seized by US hid true location
item.description: A seized tanker accused of smuggling sanctioned oil has long hidden its true location. BBC Verify examines how.

item.title: Sandie Peggie tribunal judgement amended after 'made up' quote row
item.description: The nurse has confirmed her legal team will appeal the findings of the tribunal which were published on Monday.
